titleStmt.title: Scripture proof for singing hymns and spiritual songs, or, An answer to several queries and objections frequently made use of to stumble and turn aside young Christians from their duty to God in singing of psalms gathered out of the Scriptures of truth, to which is added the testimony of some learned men, to prove that Scripture-psalms are intended by all those three words, psalms, hymns, and songs, used by the Apostle, Eph. 5. 19, Colos. 3. 16 / by E.H.
titleStmt.author: E. H.
